About Me

Let me tell you a little about myself and what I do...

Hi! My name is Dominique Maack

I am a full-stack web developer specializing in React.js and Node.js technologies. I enjoy applying my creativity to building web applications with a good design and the usersâ€™ needs in mind. I recently graduated from Lamba School in full-stack web development and computer science where I completed six cross-functional projects.

In addition to web development, I have a background in health and wellness as a contractor, coach, and specialist. I graduated from the University of Utah with a Bachelor's Degree in Exercise Sport Science in Spring 2015.
